

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgkey, configuration_value as cfgvalue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'fd15gst1metear5d857dbmpd85'
            and expiry > '1354843664';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                  thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                          from currencies;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id
                                 from products p
                                 where products_id='2' limit 1;
